parameters.toolDescription:
Work with agent to retrieve data from Database specifically about OBC Agent - Owen

Stores and retrieves context-specific knowledge for the 7 levers Overseer - Sven Agent, including the MSPM  Ecosystem Merging Framework, Influence Mastery system, GHIC Filter criteria, Contact Mapping Tool insights, and prior CRM/voice-to-text logs.
Optimized to return relevant, high-value strategies, examples, and action steps for identifying, attracting, integrating, and leveraging teammates with unique skills â€” enabling entrepreneurs, executives, and high performers to scale money, time, and impact.
